name: Viper Energy Partners LP
description: Viper Energy Partners LP is a publicly traded master limited partnership engaged in the acquisition, ownership, and exploitation of oil and natural gas properties in the United States. Founded in 2014 and headquartered in Midland, Texas, Viper is a subsidiary of Diamondback Energy, Inc., which provides the company with a solid operational foundation and strategic advantages in the energy sector. Viper primarily focuses on acquiring mineral and royalty interests in high-quality resource plays in the Permian Basin, one of the most productive oil regions in North America. By leveraging its relationship with Diamondback Energy, Viper seeks to optimize the production of its assets while minimizing operational risks and costs. The company benefits from a diverse portfolio of properties, allowing it to generate stable cash flows and return value to its unitholders through quarterly distributions. Viper's strategy includes active management of its mineral interests and pursuing opportunistic acquisitions to enhance its asset base. As a leader in the energy sector, Viper Energy Partners is committed to responsible resource development, prioritizing environmental stewardship and sustainability in its operations.

seo.meta_title: Viper Energy Partners LP | Oil & Gas Mineral Rights
seo.meta_description: Explore Viper Energy Partners LP, a leader in oil and gas mineral rights acquisition and management in the Permian Basin. Learn about their commitment to sustainability and energy production.

faq.question: What does Viper Energy Partners LP do?
faq.answer: Viper Energy Partners LP acquires and manages oil and natural gas mineral and royalty interests.

faq.question: Where is Viper Energy headquartered?
faq.answer: Viper Energy is headquartered in Midland, Texas, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Viper Energy?
faq.answer: Travis Stice is the CEO of Viper Energy Partners LP.

faq.question: When was Viper Energy founded?
faq.answer: Viper Energy Partners LP was founded in 2014.
